low.statement: For each place category, what is the average age of users that rated them?

medium.statement: Government has issued an improvement program for touristic places and all of them will be sorted into 'quality' categories. If the average score of a place is below 2.5, it will be marked as 'low', between 2.5 and 3.5, it will belong to the 'medium' category and above 3.5 it gets sorted into the 'high' quality category. Return a table that shows the average time spent on places from each of the quality categories

high.statement: How much money would someone spend if they want to go to the top 5 best rated places in each city?
